gapminder::gapminder %>% 
  filter(year == 2002) %>% 
  mutate(x0 = lifeExp, y00 = as.numeric(continent), 
         area = pop/max(pop), rotation = 0,
         r = sqrt(area)/pi) %>% 
  mutate(group = row_number()) %>% 
  tidyr::crossing(around = 0:15/15) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
      y = y00 + r * (cos(2*pi*around)) + 
        r,
      x = x0 + r * (sin(2*pi*around)) * 
        8 # manual spread factor
      ) %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  aes(x = x, y = y, group = group) + 
  qlayer(stat = "identity", 
         geom = statexpress:::qproto_update(GeomPolygon, aes(alpha = .6, 
                                                             color = "black",
                                                             fill = "white")))
